name: Colors in Motion
description:
Colors in Motion is an action-puzzle game developed by two students as a final project for our interactive game design class. It is provided here with full source code so anyone may learn from our game.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • WASD keys to change color.
  • Spacebar to move blocks from a distance (once unlocked).
  • R to (re)start a level.
  • Escape exits the game.

If you enjoy the game or have any questions about how it was made, please ask. We would love to hear from you.

Please do not copy anything from the game without our permission, but if you ask for it, you will probably get it.

Note that the GameMaker source files were developed with GameMaker Studio 1.4. It has not been tested on any other version.
